pkgmetadata.longdescription: Confidence Intervals for Standardized Regression Coefficients // Generates confidence intervals for standardized regression coefficients using delta method standard errors for models fitted by lm() as described in Yuan and Chan (2011) doi:10.1007/s11336-011-9224-6 and Jones and Waller (2015) doi:10.1007/s11336-013-9380-y. A description of the package and code examples are presented in Pesigan, Sun, and Cheung (2023) doi:10.1080/00273171.2023.2201277.
